content:
Angad Arts Hotel welcomes your four legged family members. As a lifestyle hotel, your pet is part of your lifestyle and we are pleased to offer a doggy bed/blanket, doggy bags, water and food bowls and special treats. All pets must be good citizens and cannot be left unattended in the room. 60lbs or less $75 pet fee will apply. 

Please call ahead so that your furry friend won't have to lift a paw. 

 

For any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at info@angadartshotel.com. We look forward to speaking with you about Angad Arts Hotel, a wholly new hospitality experience and beacon for St. Louis’ vibrant arts scene.
